attributes.description: The identifier of the logical EHR management system in which this EHR was created.
attributes.name: system_id

attributes.description: The unique identifier of this EHR.
attributes.name: ehr_id

attributes.description: List of contributions causing changes to this EHR. Each contribution contains a list of versions, which may include references to any number of `VERSION` instances, i.e. items of type `VERSIONED_COMPOSITION` and `VERSIONED_FOLDER`.
attributes.name: contributions

attributes.description: Reference to `EHR_STATUS` object for this EHR.
attributes.name: ehr_status

attributes.description: Reference to `EHR_ACCESS` object for this EHR.
attributes.name: ehr_access

attributes.description: Master list of all Versioned Composition references in this EHR.
attributes.name: compositions

attributes.description: Optional directory structure for this EHR. If present, this is a reference to the first member of `_folders_`.
attributes.name: directory

attributes.description: Time of creation of the EHR.
attributes.name: time_created

attributes.description: Optional additional Folder structures for this EHR. If set, the `_directory_` attribute refers to the first member.
attributes.name: folders

attributes.description: Optional list of tags associated with this EHR. Tag `_target_` values can only be within the same EHR.
attributes.name: tags

meta_info.description: The EHR object is the root object and access point of an EHR for a subject of care.
meta_info.name: EHR
